id.comment: Set 1 - Test multiple procedures with 0 clause. 0 clause, Select stmt

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s

id.comment: 0 clause, Select read

query.querystr: read r; Select r

id.comment: 0 clause, Select print

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn

id.comment: 0 clause, Select while

query.querystr: while w; Select w

id.comment: 0 clause, Select if

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs

id.comment: 0 clause, Select assign

query.querystr: assign a; Select a

id.comment: 0 clause, Select variable

query.querystr: variable v; Select v

id.comment: 0 clause, Select constant

query.querystr: constant c; Select c

id.comment: 0 clause, Select procedure

query.querystr: procedure proc; Select proc

id.comment: Set 2 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. Follows clause. Follows, Select all stmt that is followed

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s such that Follows(s, s1)

id.comment: Set 2 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. Follows clause. Follows, Select all prog_line that act as stmt that is followed

query.querystr: prog_line n; stmt s1; Select n such that Follows(n, s1)

id.comment: Follows, Select all stmt that follows

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s1 such that Follows(s, s1)

id.comment: Follows, Select all prog_line that act as stmt that follows

query.querystr: prog_line n; stmt s; Select n such that Follows(s, n)

id.comment: Follows, Select all assign that is followed

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a such that Follows(a, s)

id.comment: Follows, Select all assign that is followed

query.querystr: assign a; prog_line n; Select a such that Follows(a, n)

id.comment: Follows, Select all stmt that follows assign

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Follows(a, s)

id.comment: Follows, Select all prog_line that act as stmt that follows assign

query.querystr: assign a; prog_line n; Select n such that Follows(a, n)

id.comment: Follows, Sequential stmt in same stmtLst

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Follows(16, 17)

id.comment: Follows, Distant stmt in same stmtLst

query.querystr: procedure proc; Select proc such that Follows(3, 12)

id.comment: Follows, Sequential stmt in different stmtLst

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(3, 4)

id.comment: Follows, Distant stmt in different stmtLst

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Follows(14, 22)

id.comment: Follows, Sequential but different procedure 1

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows(12, 13)

id.comment: Follows, Sequential but different procedure 2

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows(13, 12)

id.comment: Follows, Distant but different procedure 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Follows(1, 24)

id.comment: Follows, Distant but different procedure 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Follows(4, 14)

id.comment: Set 3 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. Follows* clause. Follows*, Select all stmt that is followed*

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s such that Follows*(s, s1)

id.comment: Follows*, Select all stmt that follows* print

query.querystr: print pn; stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(pn, s)

id.comment: Follows*, Select all prog_line that act as stmt that follows* print

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Follows*(9, 10)

id.comment: Set 4 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. Parent clause. Parent, Select all parent stmt

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s such that Parent(s, s1)

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s1 such that Parent(s, s1)

id.comment: Parent, Select all read child of if

query.querystr: if ifs; read r; Select r such that Parent(ifs, r)

id.comment: Parent, stmt at same nesting level

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(2, 3)

id.comment: Parent, stmt is directly nested

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Parent(3, 11)

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Parent(13, 9)

id.comment: Set 6 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. UsesS clause. UsesS, Select all stmt that uses a variable

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Uses(s, v)

id.comment: Set 6 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. UsesS clause. UsesS, Select all prog_line that act as stmt that uses a variable

query.querystr: prog_line n; variable v; Select n such that Uses(n, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all variable that is used

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select v such that Uses(s, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all variable that is used

query.querystr: prog_line n; variable v; Select v such that Uses(n, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all assign that uses a variable

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses(a, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all variable that is used by assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v such that Uses(a, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all print that uses a variable

query.querystr: print pn; variable v; Select pn such that Uses(pn, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all variable used by print

query.querystr: print pn; variable v; Select v such that Uses(pn, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all while that uses a variable

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select w such that Uses(w, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all variable used by while

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select v such that Uses(w, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select read that uses a variable

query.querystr: read r; variable v; Select r such that Uses(r, v)

id.comment: UsesS, Select all variable used by read

query.querystr: read r; variable v; Select v such that Uses(r, v)

id.comment: UsesS, LHS stmt# RHS wildcard

query.querystr: procedure proc; Select proc such that Uses(3, _)

id.comment: UsesS, LHS wildcard RHS ident

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Uses(_, "j")

id.comment: Set 7 - Test multiple procedures with a few s.t. ModifiesS clause. ModifiesS, Select all stmt that modifies a variable

id.comment: Set 8 - Test multiple procedures with a few p.a. assign clause. Pattern assign, Select a LHS v RHS v

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS v RHS v

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS v RHS v1

query.querystr: assign a; variable v, v1; Select a pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS v RHS v1

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v1 LHS v RHS v1

query.querystr: assign a; variable v, v1; Select v pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS v RHS Ident

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _"x"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS v RHS Ident

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"x"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS Ident RHS v

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a("z", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS Ident RHS v

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a("z", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS wildcard RHS v

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS wildcard RHS v

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS v RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS v RHS wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS matches in different procedures

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a("z", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS matches in different procedures

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a("z", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a LHS matches only in 1 procedure

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a("l", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v LHS matches only in 1 procedure

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a("l", _)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a RHS matches in different procedures

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _"y"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v RHS matches in different procedures

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"y"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select a RHS matches only in 1 procedure

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a pattern a(v, _"k"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, Select v RHS matches only in 1 procedure

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a(v, _"k"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, LHS and RHS matches in different procedure

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("z", _"x"_)

id.comment: Pattern assign, LHS and RHS matches only in 1 procedure

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("k", _"l"_)
